name: Super Sportmatchen
overview: Enjoy a fine selection of sport disciplines, ranging from the frantic and fast paced to the relaxed and playful! Invite your friends, foes and family to a game of fun competitive sports! Features: Find out interesting facts about your fellow competitors, such as: Who has the fastest fingers and the steadiest hands? Who can withstand the pressure to perform under extreme stress? Who will flamboyantly brag when the victory is theirs? Who will reveal themselves as the sore losers that they truly are? Was your sports career ruined by an unfortunate knee accident? Gloat in your own competitive awesomeness! Enjoy being the best at something! Feel the rush of excitement as you set a new world record! Imagine yourself at the top of the podium! Remember that winning isn't everything, but winners have more fun!
